text: Antono is an Esperanto masculine given name that is a form of Anthony, as well as a surname. Notable people with this name include the following: ==Given name== *Antono Refa, fictional character from Babylon 5, played by William Forward ==Surname== *Amat Antono (born 1958), Indonesian politician *Ian Antono (born Jauw Hian Ling, 1950), Indonesian guitarist and songwriter ==See also== *Anton (given name) *Anton (surname) *Antona (name) *Antone *Antoni *Antonio *Antonov (surname) *Antony ==Notes== Category:Masculine given names
title: Antono (name)
